name: Cubedown Shooter
description:
Code: https://github.com/TheMarabu/Topdown-Shooter.git

In this game you fight against enemies that spawn in waves. They become faster every second and you have to survive.

Controls:

- shooting ,,L-Mouse Button"

- movement ,,W (Forwards) | S (Backwards)

- sprinting ,,L-Shift"

I planned to add a shop if i'm not too lazy.
